title: Apple patents multi-use magnetic iPad stand, embedded environmental sensor tech
text:
Apple patents multi-use magnetic iPad stand, embedded environmental sensor tech 
Published By: AppleInsider.com - Today 
Apple on Tuesday was granted patent rights to an all-purpose docking solution for iPad and embedded sensor technology that could one day lea...
